content:
Cinnamon and nutmeg are a classic combination that evokes feelings of warmth and comfort! Cardamom is an excellent choice to pair with apples, too. Its unique, sweet-savory flavor complements the sweetness of apples beautifully. Try using ground cardamom in your apple recipes, starting with a small amount (about 1/4 teaspoon) and adjusting to taste.

It's great to hear that you're enjoying the digital coupons at Safeway and saving money on your favorite spices and baking supplies! $20 is a significant amount, and it's wonderful that you're making the most of it. Digital coupons can really add up and make a difference in your grocery budget.

Remember to keep an eye on the weekly ads and sales, and plan your shopping trip accordingly. You can also consider stocking up on non-perishable items when they're at their cheapest, so you have them on hand when you need them.

Now, let's get back to baking! What's your favorite type of apple dessert? Do you prefer pies, crisps, cakes, or something else entirely?

(And don't forget to experiment with cardamom in your apple recipes. You might be surprised at how beautifully it pairs with cinnamon and nutmeg!)
